mapper.insert: insert into orders (id, open_id, choice_id, reserve_name, phone, start_time, end_time, `status`, pay_status, reserve_time, notes) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{choiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reserveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reserveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update orders set open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, choice_id = #{choiceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserve_name = #{reserveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserve_time = #{reserveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, notes = #{notes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, open_id, choice_id, reserve_name, phone, start_time, end_time, `status`, pay_status, reserve_time, notes from orders where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, open_id, choice_id, reserve_name, phone, start_time, end_time, `status`, pay_status, reserve_time, notes from orders
select id, open_id, choice_id, reserve_name, phone, start_time, end_time, `status`, pay_status, reserve_time, notes from orders where open_id=#{openid} order by start_time desc
select id, open_id, choice_id, reserve_name, phone, start_time, end_time, `status`, pay_status, reserve_time, notes from orders where open_id=#{open_id} and status=0
